snippet: In the third day of attacks by the Islamic State on towns in eastern Syria, militants took land in an assault that state news media say has killed 300 people.
lead_paragraph: In the third day of attacks by the Islamic State on towns in eastern Syria, militants took land in an assault that state news media say has killed 300 people.

headline.main: ISIS Captures Government-Held Ground in Eastern Syria

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
